resources.string:
"
Songle is an interactive game - it's easy, fun and helps you explore Edinburgh! " "

Walk around the map area, and when you're close enough to a placemark you'll be able to click on it and collect the hidden word!" "

Once you have enough words to know the song, click on the yellow button to guess it!" "

How many points can you get?"
Press the yellow Map Button above to get started!
This is what the game looks like:

"
HELP SCREEN - MAPS" "In the map, every marker shows the location of a word from the lyrics of the song." "When you're close enough to a placemark, you'll be able to tap it to reveal the word!" "

If you click the icon in the top left the menu will be displayed, where you can find:" "
Hints" "
The words you've found already" "
Once you think you know the song, press on the yellow button at the bottom of the screen to guess!" "


Good luck!"

"A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion. " "\nThe material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic."
